Brine May: Successful Swim checks are critical successes, and failure does not inflict sinking
Charming Liar: Critical success on a Lie improves a target's attitude by 1 step once per conversation
Natural Medicine: Can use Nature to Treat Wounds; gives a +2 bonus in wilderness
Combat
Hit Points: 19 Armor Class: 17 (dexterity (4 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 15 (strength; trained)
Armor: Leather Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Claws (+8 1d4+2 S; dexterity; expert); Hatchet (+7 1d6+2 S R10'; strength; expert); Shortsword (+8 1d6+2 P/S; dexterity; expert); Slag Claws (+7 1d6+2 S; strength; expert); Starknife (+8 1d4+2 P/S [Crit +d6] R20'; dexterity; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Hag Claws: Claws inflict 1d4 HP slashing
Slag May: Slag Claws inflict 1d6 HP slashing
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Accursed Claws: Critical hits with claws also inflict 1d4 HP persistent mental
Callow May: Rolling Deception for initiative makes foes that haven't acted off-guard vs. self
Double Slice: (2) Makes simultaneous Strikes with 2 melee weapons at the current multiple attack penalty; a non-agile weapon on the second Strike suffers -2 attack
Mist Child: Increases the flat check DC to target self when concealed or hidden to 6 or 12
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Slag May: Slag Claws are cold-iron weapons
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +6 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Called: +1 vs. mental effects, and successes vs. mental control are critical successes
Dream May: +2 vs. sleep and dream effects/Sleep restores 1 Hit Points and reduces drained and doomed conditions by 2
Occult Resistance: +1 vs. occult effects
Magic
Attack: Occult Innate: +3 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Occult Innate: 13 (charisma; trained)
Magic Notes: Hag Magic: Knows 1 chosen occult innate spell of up to 4th rank; can cast it at 4th rank once per day
